content.value:
Imagine being in tech right now and having just outed yourself as someone who voted for white supremacy, homophobia, transphobia, and *hate* only for it to be for literally nothing.

Such a hypothetical situation must sting a bit.
content.html: Imagine being in tech right now and having just outed yourself as someone who voted for white supremacy, homophobia, transphobia, and *hate* only for it to be for literally nothing. Such a hypothetical situation must sting a bit.
